title: Vinny Russo
description: This week Vinny Russo of Lamborghini North America joins us along with Mike Musto whom you all probably already know.  We of course talk Lambos, we also discuss Vinny's experience on Bull Run and the Silver State Classic.  In addition to those stories we discuss the balancing fun, entertainment and responsibility and the double standards that automotive journalists are held to.  Oh yeah and Matt contracted Panamanian lung AIDS.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
